title: Banana Bread
description: A moist and delicious banana bread, perfect for breakfast or as a snack.

title: Lisa’s Cheesy Hashbrowns
description: A delicious side dish to bring to a potluck or holiday dinner.

title: Chocolate Chompers
description: Chocolate Chompers are rich, chewy cookies with a delightful crunch, perfect for satisfying a sweet tooth.

title: Clam Chowder
description: A hearty clam chowder, perfect for a cold winter day.

title: Greek Butter Cookies (Koulourakia)
description: A traditional Greek butter cookie, perfect for dipping in coffee or tea.

title: Hello Dollies
description: A classic dessert bar with a graham cracker crust, chocolate chips, coconut, and walnuts.

title: Hummus
description: A creamy and versatile Middle Eastern dip made with chickpeas and tahini, perfect for dipping vegetables or spreading on sandwiches.

title: Hushwee
description: Hushwee is a simple, comforting dish with ground beef and rice, seasoned with warm spices and simmered to perfection.

title: Katie’s Potato Salad
description: A classic potato salad with a tangy twist, incorporating pickle juice for an extra layer of flavor, ideal for picnics and potlucks.

title: Chicken Wings Buffalo Style
description: A tangy and flavorful Buffalo-style chicken wing recipe that’s perfect for game day or any casual gathering.

title: One Pan Scrambled Eggs
description: These one pan scrambled eggs are creamy and fluffy, baked to perfection, an easy dish for a hearty breakfast or brunch.

title: Pumpkin Ice Cream Pie
description: A unique pie that combines the rich flavors of pumpkin and spices with the cool creaminess of ice cream, encased in a flaky pie crust.

title: Sour Cream Coffee Cake
description: This cake offers a moist, rich flavor with a sweet and crunchy topping, ideal for pairing with your favorite coffee.

title: Sweet Stuff
description: A simple sweet topping combining sesame seeds and sugar, providing a delightful crunchy and sweet bread topping.

title: Tuna Noodle Casserole
description: A quick and easy tuna noodle casserole.

title: Za’atar
description: Za’atar spread is a flavorful Middle Eastern mixture of herbs and oil, perfect for slathering on dough to make a fragrant and savory bread.
